entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: SE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
